description: Now that we have keystone integrated into glance, we shouldn't be filtering glance results with is_public=none.
title: Nova should not be filtering glance images with is_public=none

comments.content: Now that we have keystone integrated into glance, we shouldn't be filtering glance results with is_public=none.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content: Actually, this might not need to happen. If someone deploys glance w/o auth, they should still be able to get non-public images. Anybody have any thoughts?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
